author: cbs8
title: Collab Introduces Rankzoo for iOS - #1 Analytics Platform for Vine - Release of Free Mobile App for On-the-Go Discovery of Vine Entertainers
text:
Collab
Leading digital content studio develops free iOS app for Vine users with first of its kind ranking and browsing service to help Viners grow their audience and brands to find influencers
LOS ANGELES , Oct. 6, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Collab ( www.collabcreators.com ), the Los Angeles -based digital content studio, announced today the debut of its innovative mobile app for iOS devices: Rankzoo ( http://apple.co/1LdXw5l ). Rankzoo is the #1 analytics platform for Vine and a go-to source for Vine stats. Collab first created the service as a web application – www.Rankzoo.com – which aggregates data from Vine, giving Viners insight into their channel. It has become a daily destination for Viners to develop their content strategy and track their audience growth. Rankzoo for iOS introduces a fresh look and improved ranking system that combines All Time Loops and All Time Followers into one overall rank. The new system rewards active Viners and the result is a more accurate picture of Vine's top users.
The user-friendly mobile app offers users several benefits:
Track average Vine performance – Rankzoo crunches billions of data points into key metrics that every Viner should know, allowing Viners to learn their average performance statistics. Increase Loops and Followers – Rankzoo can be used by Viners to gain insight to create more engaging Vines, discover collaboration partners and effectively grow Loops and Followers. Get discovered – As Viners grow their audiences, brands can discover and contact Vine talent with partnership opportunities, helping Viners earn more income and brands to reach new audiences. Key features of the Rankzoo mobile app include:
Find Top Vine creators – 'Leaderboard' sorting ranks most popular Vine talent based on number of Followers and Loops, allowing a simplified way to see the hottest Viners on the platform. Track Vine Stats – Each Vine profile tracks individual audience growth and displays average post performance (loops, likes, revines, comments, engagement rate). Users can also view a channel's activity in daily, weekly, and monthly increments. Direct Messages – The 'Contact Viner' button allows brands to start discussions with Viners directly in the Rankzoo app. "Through pure word of mouth, Rankzoo has grown from a simple listing of Vine statistics into an essential resource for the Vine creator community and brands advertising on Vine. We're proud to unveil the completely redesigned Rankzoo app and new, improved ranking system, which makes it easier than ever for Viners to track their audience growth and brands to discover top Vine talent," said Tyler McFadden , Co-CEO of Collab.
Rankzoo is free to download today in the App Store. To download the iOS app please visit https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/rankzoo/id1039147069?ls=1&mt=8
About Collab
Collab is a digital content and creator development studio that discovers rising video creators using proprietary software, develops talent and helps build their audiences across multiple platforms, and collaborates with select creators to produce premium shows for TV and OTT platforms. In 2013, Collab pioneered a system that allowed Viners to monetize their Vines for the first time. Their mission is to boost the digital entertainer economy and make the lives of independent creators easier. Collab's network includes over 250 of the top Vine creators bringing over 230 million Vine followers and seven billion loops per month.
Collab is co-founded by digital video veterans The McFadden Bros., James, Tyler, and Will. Also on-board the executive team is former Fullscreen executive and Collab COO, Soung Kang . Collab has over 40 employees. For more information, visit www.collabcreators.com .
